SendPort.Name: kroger.PR.MFConfirms.SendEmail
SendPort.Description: Non-ACD : Used for sending daily MF Confirms from PR to trader

PrimaryTransport.TransportTypeData: <CustomProps><Subject vt="8">Custodian Link Event - Pershing Mutual</Subject><SMTPHost vt="8">mailblast.fi.com</SMTPHost><CC vt="8">r.dominguez@fi.com,d.scheeter@fi.com,m.owens@fi.com,m.leung@fi.com,mi.lu@fi.com</CC><DeliveryReceipt vt="11">0</DeliveryReceipt><EmailBodyFileCharset vt="8">utf-8</EmailBodyFileCharset><EmailBodyTextCharset vt="8">utf-8</EmailBodyTextCharset><From vt="8">CustodianLink@fi.com</From><MessagePartsAttachments vt="19">0</MessagePartsAttachments><ReadReceipt vt="11">0</ReadReceipt><To vt="8">trader@fi.com</To></CustomProps>

SendPort.Name: kroger.PR.MFConfirms.SaveFiles
SendPort.Description: Non-ACD : Used for sending daily MF Confirms from PR to trader. This Send location has been disabled because we do not need t archive the files locally anymore as the emails are being sent to the traders. (as of 5/14/2014)

PrimaryTransport.TransportTypeData:
<CustomProps><AdapterConfig vt="8"><Config xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><Firewall><AutoDetect>False</AutoDetect><FirewallType>0</FirewallType><Host /><Password>******</Password><Port>0</Port><User /></Firewall><Host /><Other /><Password>******</Password><Port>22</Port><PortName /><Protocol>0</Protocol><Script>$query="truncate table ACD_STG_ACCOUNT;truncate table ACD_STG_POSITION;truncate table ACD_STG_SECURITY;truncate table ACD_STG_TRANSACTION;"
Write-EventLog -LogName "Application" -Source "BizTalk Server" -EventID 3001 -EntryType Information -Message $query;
Write-EventLog -LogName "Application" -Source "BizTalk Server" -EventID 3001 -EntryType Information -Message $server;
try
{
 $error.clear();
Invoke-Sqlcmd -ServerInstance $server -database $database  -Query $query -QueryTimeout 600 -OutputSqlErrors $True -ErrorAction  STOP
}
catch
{
    foreach($err in $error) { 
        Write-EventLog -LogName "Application" -Source "BizTalk Server" -EventID 3001 -EntryType Error -Message $err;
    }
}
</Script><SSHAcceptServerHostKey><Store>MY</Store><StorePassword>******</StorePassword><StoreType>0</StoreType><Subject /><AcceptAny>False</AcceptAny></SSHAcceptServerHostKey><SSHAuthMode>2</SSHAuthMode><SSHCert><Store>MY</Store><StorePassword>******</StorePassword><StoreType>0</StoreType><Subject /></SSHCert><SSHCompressionAlgorithms>none</SSHCompressionAlgorithms><Timeout>60</Timeout><TransportLog><Location>Application</Location><LogMode>3</LogMode><LogType>1</LogType></TransportLog><URIIdentity>PowerShell://</URIIdentity><User /><Variables>server=SEADEVIL\INST2
database=ACD
</Variables><uri>PowerShell://</uri></Config></AdapterConfig></CustomProps>
